item.title: Hello
item.description: Hello blog. After years of waffling and procrastination, I’ve finally managed to put together a blog platform that doesn’t feel like chewing on broken glass. Hugo seems to strike a good balance between flexible, powerful, simple, and extensible. One less excuse to avoid putting thought to pixel.
